tool_description: Convert HTML to PNG and PDF Files. All files are available for download for 7 days.
name: HTML TO IMAGE
title: HTML TO IMAGE

api_list.name: Upload HTML
api_list.description: Send HTML.outerHTML and title as json format. Returns newly created image link that can be downloaded for 7 days. Then image will be deleted.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-image1.p.rapidapi.com/download-png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: HTML to PDF
api_list.description:
Created a PDF file from HTML. 

** The URL with the PDF to download will not work in chrome, but will work with all other browsers. **
api_list.code:
